description: Context to the latest housing numbers, climate change as an economics problem, and more on specialty drugs
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Tuesday June 24, 2014
teaser: Context to the latest housing numbers, climate change as an economics problem, and more on specialty drugs
contentencoded: Home prices are up, but not by as much as predicted - more on the context behind the numbers. Plus, a new angle on climate change is aiming to portray the issues as an economic problem. Also, 2015 will be the first year that health care costs are expected to rise since the recession. The reason? Specialty drugs.
title: PODCAST: Specialty drugs
